ticket.title: Configuration and Usage documentation incomplete in activeresource/README
ticket.original-body:
In the README file of activeresource, the last paragraph in the section titled "Configuration and Usage" is incomplete. Here is the current verbiage:
"As you can see, the methods are quite similar to Active Record's methods for dealing with database records. But rather than dealing with" [end]

version.body:

Thanks.
